The amendment restricts the claim of input tax to invoices meeting specific requirements. Only invoices issued from the Electronic Invoicing System (Smart Invoice) or those issued by taxable suppliers exempted from using Smart Invoice, are allowed as documentary evidence to support input tax claims.
Effective 1st January 2025, input tax claims are restricted to invoices issued from the Smart Invoice system or those issued by taxable suppliers exempted from using Smart Invoice.
